title: 求大神们教怎么修改神奇宝贝mod的初始精灵？
author: pls520520
txt_content:
我就想请教怎么改神奇宝贝mod的初始精灵
       就是进游戏的时候选择的精灵
                   求解答

原来是这样的




QQ图片20160123001127.jpg (126.18 KB, 下载次数: 10)

下载附件

2016-1-23 00:09 上传





怎么修改成这样




QQ图片20160123001135.png (7.06 KB, 下载次数: 12)

下载附件

2016-1-23 00:13 上传

replies.author: 端木云天
replies.txt_content: 这个好像改不了吧，你那个是怎么弄出来的？

replies.author: 594crx
replies.txt_content:
把配置文件最下面的
starters {
    S:"1 - First Choice"=Bulbasaur
    S:"2 - Second Choice"=Squirtle
    S:"3 - Third Choice"=Charmander
    S:"4 - Fourth Choice"=Chikorita
    S:"5 - Fifth Choice"=Totodile
    S:"6 - Sixth Choice"=Cyndaquil
    S:"7 - Seventh Choice"=Treecko
    S:"8 - Eighth Choice"=Mudkip
    S:"9 - Ninth Choice"=Torchic
    S:"_10 - Tenth Choice"=Turtwig
    S:"_11 - Eleventh Choice"=Piplup
    S:"_12 - Twelfth Choice"=Chimchar
    S:"_13 - Thirteenth Choice"=Snivy
    S:"_14 - Fourteenth Choice"=Oshawott
    S:"_15 - Fifteenth Choice"=Tepig
}
这些“=”号后面的英文改成别的神奇宝贝的英文

replies.author: qazqaz123
replies.txt_content:
这个图是破碎宝石么  = -=
我朋友的服务器之前就和这个一毛一样

replies.author: qazqaz123
replies.txt_content:
该这个要改配置文件
在config里，里面有宠物口袋妖怪的英语 poke什么的
点击翻到最后面
把配置文件最下面的（然后就和楼上的大兄弟说的一样）
starters {
    S:"1 - First Choice"=Bulbasaur
    S:"2 - Second Choice"=Squirtle
    S:"3 - Third Choice"=Charmander
    S:"4 - Fourth Choice"=Chikorita
    S:"5 - Fifth Choice"=Totodile
    S:"6 - Sixth Choice"=Cyndaquil
    S:"7 - Seventh Choice"=Treecko
    S:"8 - Eighth Choice"=Mudkip
    S:"9 - Ninth Choice"=Torchic
    S:"_10 - Tenth Choice"=Turtwig
    S:"_11 - Eleventh Choice"=Piplup
    S:"_12 - Twelfth Choice"=Chimchar
    S:"_13 - Thirteenth Choice"=Snivy
    S:"_14 - Fourteenth Choice"=Oshawott
    S:"_15 - Fifteenth Choice"=Tepig
}

replies.author: 龙魂豹
replies.txt_content:
qazqaz123 发表于 2016-1-23 14:46
该这个要改配置文件
在config里，里面有宠物口袋妖怪的英语 poke什么的
点击翻到最后面
谁有神奇宝贝的模组链接

replies.author: 死哥哥
replies.txt_content:
服务端修改方法：打开config这个文件夹 里面有一个叫pixelmon的文件  
 S:"1 - First Choice"=Bulbasaur
    S:"2 - Second Choice"=Squirtle
    S:"3 - Third Choice"=Charmander
    S:"4 - Fourth Choice"=Chikorita
    S:"5 - Fifth Choice"=Totodile
    S:"6 - Sixth Choice"=Cyndaquil
    S:"7 - Seventh Choice"=Treecko
    S:"8 - Eighth Choice"=Mudkip
    S:"9 - Ninth Choice"=Torchic
    S:"_10 - Tenth Choice"=Turtwig
    S:"_11 - Eleventh Choice"=Piplup
    S:"_12 - Twelfth Choice"=Chimchar
    S:"_13 - Thirteenth Choice"=Snivy
    S:"_14 - Fourteenth Choice"=Oshawott
    S:"_15 - Fifteenth Choice"=Tepig
找到这个即可    =号后面就是精灵的名字啦~
